definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: A term sheet is a conditional offer.
sentences.chinese: 投资意向书是个有条件的要约。

sentences.english: In that situation your EOI would be removed from the Pool.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下，你的意向书会从选择选池中被删除。

sentences.english: Buyer issues LOI along with NCND to the Seller.
sentences.chinese: 买方向卖方出具意向书和保密协议。

sentences.english: Can I send an old cover letter that I used at the last company?
sentences.chinese: 我能够寄去我上次应聘时用过的求职意向书吗？

sentences.english: As you can see, there are many nuances to a term sheet.
sentences.chinese: 正如你可以看到的，投资意向书中有许多微妙之处。

sentences.english: How often does EOI selection happen?
sentences.chinese: 意向书选择多久发生一次？

sentences.english: This letter of intent is made in duplicate, each party holding one, with the same legal effect.
sentences.chinese: 意向书一式二份，双方各持一份，具有同等法律效力。

sentences.english: EOIs will be selected from the Pool every two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 从选池中每两个星期选择一次意向书。

sentences.english: The term sheet is only seven pages, but it is complicated and even mysterious.
sentences.chinese: 投资意向书只有七页纸，但它却是复杂甚至神秘的。

sentences.english: The letter of intent concerned both para-taekwondo kyorugi and poomsae.
sentences.chinese: 意向书涉及残障跆拳道对打和品势。

sentences.english: Our two companies jointly signed a letter of intent to cooperate for this year.
sentences.chinese: 我们两家公司联署了一份今年的合作意向书。

sentences.english: The letter of intent puts the initiative on a more formal footing.
sentences.chinese: 这份意向书的签署，使得该计划步上正轨。

sentences.english: The master obligation contract guaranteed or letter of intent and other related documents.
sentences.chinese: 被担保项下主债务合同或者意向书及其他有关文件。

sentences.english: Any problem undecided in the Intention Agreement shall be settled in the formal contract.
sentences.chinese: 本意向书中未尽事宜将在正式合同中解决。

sentences.english: There is no pass mark for EOIs being selected from the Pool.
sentences.chinese: 在意向书选池中，没有固定的过线分数。

sentences.english: Only products included in an EOI are eligible for prequalification.
sentences.chinese: 只有列入意向书的产品才有资格接受资格预审。

definition: to agree to and sign (a treaty etc)
to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
